Package controller

Class DataController

java.lang.Object
controller.DataController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class DataController extends Object implements Serializable
The DataController class represents a controller for handling user data in the system. This class is responsible for managing the list of users, adding and deleting users, and reading and writing user data to a file. It also provides methods for setting and retrieving the current session user. This class implements the Serializable interface to allow for serialization of user data to a file.
Author:
Shivam Patel and Neel Patel
